42 /**
43  * @file sys_mon_cfg.h
44  * @author foxBMS Team
45  * @date 2019-11-28 (date of creation)
46  * @updated 2023-02-03 (date of last update)
47  * @version v1.5.0
48  * @ingroup ENGINE_CONFIGURATION
49  * @prefix SYSM
50  *
51  * @brief configuration of the system monitoring module
52  */
53 
54 #ifndef FOXBMS__SYS_MON_CFG_H_
55 #define FOXBMS__SYS_MON_CFG_H_
56 
57 /*========== Includes =======================================================*/
58 
59 #include "diag_cfg.h"
60 
61 #include <stdint.h>
62 
63 /*========== Macros and Definitions =========================================*/
64 /** diagnosis handling type for system monitoring */
65 typedef enum {
66  SYSM_HANDLING_DO_NOTHING, /*!< take no action */
67  SYSM_HANDLING_SWITCH_OFF_CONTACTOR /*!< open contactors */
68 } SYSM_HANDLING_TYPE_e;
69 
70 /**
71  * listing of system-relevant tasks or functions which are checked by
72  * the system monitoring
73  */
74 typedef enum {
75  SYSM_TASK_ID_ENGINE, /**< diag entry for engine task */
76  SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_1ms, /**< diag entry for engine cyclic 1ms task */
77  SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_10ms, /**< diag entry for engine cyclic 10ms task */
78  SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_100ms, /**< diag entry for engine cyclic 100ms task */
79  SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_ALGORITHM_100ms, /**< diag entry for algorithm cyclic 100ms task */
80  SYSM_TASK_ID_MAX /**< end marker do not delete */
81 } SYSM_TASK_ID_e;
82 
83 /** recording activation */
84 typedef enum {
85  SYSM_RECORDING_ENABLED, /*!< enable event recording */
86  SYSM_RECORDING_DISABLED, /*!< disable event recording */
87 } SYSM_RECORDING_e;
88 
89 /** enable diagnosis entry for system monitoring */
90 typedef enum {
91  SYSM_ENABLED, /*!< entry enabled */
92  SYSM_DISABLED, /*!< entry disabled */
93 } SYSM_ACTIVATE_e;
94 
95 /** Channel configuration of one system monitoring channel */
96 typedef struct {
97  SYSM_TASK_ID_e id; /*!< the task id by its symbolic name */
98  SYSM_ACTIVATE_e enable; /*!< enable or disable system monitoring */
99  uint8_t cycleTime; /*!< max. delay time in ms until #SYSM_Notify has to be called */
100  uint8_t maxJitter; /*!< max. jitter in ms */
101  SYSM_RECORDING_e enableRecording; /*!< enabled if set to DIAG_RECORDING_ENABLED */
102  SYSM_HANDLING_TYPE_e handlingType; /*!< type of handling of system monitoring errors */
103  void (*callbackFunction)(SYSM_TASK_ID_e taskId); /*!< callback in case of error */
104 } SYSM_MONITORING_CFG_s;
105 
106 /*========== Extern Constant and Variable Declarations ======================*/
107 /** diag system monitoring struct */
108 extern SYSM_MONITORING_CFG_s sysm_ch_cfg[];
109 
110 /*========== Extern Function Prototypes =====================================*/
111 
112 /*========== Externalized Static Functions Prototypes (Unit Test) ===========*/
113 #ifdef UNITY_UNIT_TEST
114 extern void TEST_SYSM_DummyCallback(SYSM_TASK_ID_e taskId);
115 #endif
116 
117 #endif /* FOXBMS__SYS_MON_CFG_H_ */
